column3: Investigation Stage - Case Pending Investigation from Previous Year
column4: Investigation Stage - Cases Reported During the year
column5: Investigation Stage - Cases not Investigated or in which Investigation was Refused
column6: Investigation stage - Cases Declared False on Account of Mistake of Fact or Law
column7: Investigation Stage - Cases in which Chargesheets were Laid
column8: Investigated Stage - Cases in which Chargesheets were not laid but Final Report Submitted During the Year
column10: Investigation Stage - Cases Pending Investigation at the end of the year

column13: Trial Stage - Total Cases for Trial During the year
column14: Trial Stage - Cases in which Trials were Compounded or Withdrawn
column15: Trial Stage - Cases in which Trials were Completed
column17: Trial Stage - Cases Acquitted or Discharged
column18: Trials Stage - Cases Pending Trials at the End of the year
